mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, ID, BOARD_LOCATION, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_REG_ID, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_REF, BOARD_DEL,BOARD_TEL) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, '펫플레이스', #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents:CLOB}, #{id}, #{boardLocation}, 0,#{id}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE='펫플레이스'), 0, #{boardTel} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_LOCATION, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, ID, BOARD_REG_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPD_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BOARD_UPD_DATE, BOARD_REF, BOARD_CONTENTS,BOARD_TEL FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_LOCATION, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, ID, BOARD_REG_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_REG_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPD_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BOARD_UPD_DATE, BOARD_REF,BOARD_DEL, BOARD_TEL FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_REF DESC)AS RNUM, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_CATEGORY, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_LOCATION, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, ID, BOARD_REG_ID, BOARD_REG_DATE, BOARD_UPD_ID, BOARD_UPD_DATE, BOARD_REF, BOARD_DEL, BOARD_TEL FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND BOARD_LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '동물병원'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '애견카페'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '카페'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '음식점'
AND BOARD_TYPE='펫플레이스' AND BOARD_DEL=0 ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND BOARD_LOCATION LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '동물병원'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '애견카페'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '카페'
AND BOARD_CATEGORY = '음식점'
AND BOARD_TYPE='펫플레이스' AND BOARD_DEL=0
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE=#{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENTS=#{boardContents:CLOB}, BOARD_LOCATION=#{boardLocation}, BOARD_UPD_ID=#{id}, BOARD_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, BOARD_CATEGORY = #{boardCategory}, BOARD_TEL=#{boardTel} WHERE BOARD_SEQ=#{boardSeq}
